name: sigbench
description: Azure DevOps Extension to signature benchmark your files.
author: Konstantin 'cpz' L.

inputs.name: sigSize
inputs.label: Signature Sizes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Signature Sizes (default: 32 or 34, because this lenght used by BattleEye)

inputs.name: printDifference
inputs.label: Print Difference
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prints different signatures of your files

inputs.name: file1
inputs.label: File One to Compare
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type path to file one to compare

inputs.name: file2
inputs.label: File Two to Compare
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type path to file two to compare

inputs.name: customVar
inputs.label: Use proxy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Creates variable $(Sigbench.Percent) which provides information about difference percentage. Example: 80% +- 8% (98/262).
